text: Évron is a commune of 7 575 people (2006). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2019, the former communes of Châtres-la-Forêt and Saint-Christophe-du-Luat were merged into Évron.Arrêté préfectoral 14 November 2018 In its territory flows the Jouanne river. == References == Category:Communes in Mayenne
title: Évron
